title: Looking at children's movements (TEFC)
brief_description: The study of movement in human beings is beginning to be treated scientifically, and a study is being made of infants from birth. It seems likely that predictions can be made from the study of an infant’s movements about his or her attitudes and character throughout life. Contains b&w sequences.
